## `gdocker showdeps`

Display the dependency graph for specified Docker images.

To see help and available options for this command:

```{bash}
gdocker help showdeps
```

Example: Show the dependency graph for selected images in Mermaid format on GFM:

```{bash}
#| eval: false
gdocker showdeps bigtools_a samtools_a:1.17 star_a:*
```

:::{.mermaid}
```{=html}
`r ngsmisc::run_get_stdout("gdocker showdeps bigtools_a samtools_a:1.17 star_a:*")`
```
:::
